00042 class MIXIM_API NetwToMacControlInfo : public cObject
00043 {
00044   protected:

00050     NetwToMacControlInfo(const LAddress::L2Type& addr = LAddress::L2NULL)
00051       : cObject()
00052       , nextHopMac(addr)
00053     {
00054     };
00055 
00057     virtual ~NetwToMacControlInfo() {};
00058 
00060     virtual const LAddress::L2Type& getNextHopMac() const {
00061       return nextHopMac;
00062     };
00063     virtual const LAddress::L2Type& getDest() const {
00064       return nextHopMac;
00065     };
00066 
00068     virtual void setNextHopMac(const LAddress::L2Type& addr) {
00069       nextHopMac = addr;
00070     };
00071     virtual void setDest(const LAddress::L2Type& addr) {
00072       nextHopMac = addr;
00073     };
